quotes.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
quotes.author: Harold Nicolson

quotes.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
quotes.author: Rodin

quotes.text: Here is one quality that one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Sometimes the cards we are dealt are not always fair. However you must keep smiling and moving on.
quotes.author: Tom Jackson
